sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均有"对手，敌手"之意。
means: opponent ： 最常用词，通常指在争论、辩论、竞选或竞赛以及其它各种矛盾冲突中站在对立面的"对手"或"敌手"。
competitor ： 指为同一目标或目的竞争者，一般无感情色彩。
enemy ： 多指充满敌意的仇敌。
foe ： 语气较强，多用于书面文字和诗歌中。指不仅敌对，而且很危险，怀有很深的敌意。
rival ： 指与某人目标一致而想赶上或超过他的人，匹敌者。

sentence.Network_en: She was the only British competitor apart from Richard Meade.
sentence.Network_cn: 她是除了理查德·米德之外唯一的英国参赛者。

sentence.Network_en: A thirty-nine-year-old competitor collapsed half-way through the marathon and died shortly afterwards.
sentence.Network_cn: 一名39岁的马拉松参赛者跑到一半时瘫倒在地，没过多久就死了。

sentence.Network_en: The first prize was awarded to the youngest competitor.
sentence.Network_cn: 一等奖授给了最年轻的比赛者.

list.abs: 竞争对手分析（competitor analysis）、顾客分析（customer analysis）和供应商分析（supplier analysis），是整个策略规划过程的 …
商务英语词汇精选: A-D-青青岛社区 ... competitor 竞争对手 competitor analysis 对手分析 complaint 投诉.
见不完全竞争（competition，imperfect）。446、Imperfect competitor 不完全竞争者购买量或销售量足以影响所在市场的价格水平的厂商。.
竞争者导向(competitor Orientation) 是指企业的市场营销活动要以竞争者为中心，关注竞争对手的营销策略和行为，并确保相对于竞争 …
...competent personnel 有资格的人员,胜任的人员competitor system 竞争机制component 部件

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 16th cent.: from French compétiteur or Latin competitor, from competit- 'striven for' (see competition)

entry.def: A company's competitors are companies who are trying to sell similar goods or services to the same people.

example.ex: The bank isn't performing as well as some of its competitors.
example.tran: 这家银行表现得不如几家竞争对手出色。

entry.def: A competitor is a person who takes part in a competition or contest.

example.ex: Herbert Blocker of Germany, one of the oldest competitors, won the individual silver medal.
example.tran: 德国的赫伯特·布洛克尔是年纪最大的选手之一，赢得了个人项目的银牌。

means.word_mean: 1. the contestant you hope to defeat;

sentences.sentence: "he wanted to know what the competition was doing"

auth_sentence.content: So just what makes him such an exceptional competitor?
auth_sentence.res_content: So just what makes him such an exceptional competitor?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: So just what makes him such an exceptional competitor?

auth_sentence.content: I just see him as another athlete and another competitor.
auth_sentence.res_content: I just see him as another athlete and another competitor.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I just see him as another athlete and another competitor.

auth_sentence.content: Beg the airline to send your ticket to its competitor.

stems_affixes.word_buile: expose暴露+itor……人→使其暴露[明白]的人→说明者
su追求+itor……人→n.求婚者,[法律]原告

sentences.en: U.S.business today is challenged by aggressive overseas competitors.
sentences.cn: 今天的美国商业受到咄咄逼人的外国竞争者的挑战。

sentences.en: We are lagging far behind our European competitors in using new technology.
sentences.cn: 我们在使用新技术方面远远落后于我们的欧洲对手。

sentences.en: We cannot afford to drop behind our competitors.
sentences.cn: 我们可担当不起落后于竞争对手的后果。
